divs: Sighting Detailswas out side to let my dogs out, when all i see is a red light apear out of no where i thought to myself thats to high to be a radio tower the about 10 sec later another red light lit up then another my dogs were barking like crazy the light that lit up at the bottem then went to the top in a perfect line! when those three lights lit all the way up i looke over it was shaped like a cresent with weird wrighting on the sides and at the top wier like things. i was standing there for about 2 min they they were gone sounded like just a swosh!
Summary: big wire thing at the top weird writing on the sides
